attributes.action: Women to be given time off during menstrual cycle every month like Spain
attributes.additional_details: Because women suffer every month in silence and it's about time we change the old mentality which is men orientated.
attributes.background: Give women time off during menstrual cycle every month like Spain

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611719
